data.expected_result: In the top left corner, it should say "Permissions not synced with: {categoryName}"
data.short_description: If channel permissions are not synced with category, it will still say they are synced
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have a permission to edit channel specific permissions - Have a channel inside a category - Press edit channel on a channel - Go to Permissions submenu - Change some channel permissions to make sure channel and category permissions are not the same - Save changes
